name: Litentry
shortDescription: Adding privacy to blockchains. We help you to make your pseudonymous identity tangible without being seen. As a decentralized identity aggregator, we provide the structure and tools to empower you and your digital identity.
description: Make Your Digital Identity Tangible. Without Being Seen. The Litentry IdentityHub allows you to aggregate your personal data from blockchains and platforms to manage granular access to dApps.
